title: Account can only play co op vs ai
body:
Last night i logged off league while in a lobby for co op vs ai. ever since i logged back in. When i log in I am automatically in a lobby alone for co op vs ai. every time i try to start a lobby in a different queue I get an error.
logging in and out does not fix this.
I get an error when trying to join a friend's lobby.
My friend gets an error when I invite them to my lobby.
i logged onto a different account on the same laptop and did not have this issue.
performing a repair did not fix the issue.

replies.body: That's pretty weird tbh o_O. I'd try running the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) with the Force Repatch option turned on if the repair hadn't worked. If that still doesn't help at all you may need to do a full reinstall, but it might be worth reaching out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) first to see about a quicker fix.
